name: Dungeon escape (itch) (DungeonEscape)
description:
Find a way out or die!

You’ve been trapped in a dungeon filled with deadly traps and ruthless enemies! But with enough cunning and nimble dexterity, there could still be a chance at survival, however small it may be. Navigate chambers of increasing difficulty as your search for an exit. Dodge or kill your captors, find keys to unlock doors, leap over spikes and watch out for saw blades!

Dungeon Escape features numerous single-screen challenges, each of which can be retried as many times as necessary. learn from mistakes and feel your skills improving with each attempt. Can you overcome the many trials that lie ahead?

You choose your moves, you can crouch, walk run and sprint. But be careful, the faster you move, the more noise you'll do, and you'll be easier to catch. There are dozens of guards so beware. Try to find a weapon and get rid of those annoying guards or hide in the shadows. And be careful with the traps and puzzles that lies ahead!

Recent Features :
  • Challenging puzzles with increasing difficulty.
  • Test yourself in both logic puzzles and skill-based challenges.
  • Features both pickup able objects as well as destructible objects.
  • Immersive environment. 
  • Added new swords and armor to protect yourself!
